name: Infected Weeper
location: A total of 8 infected weepers spawn in [[Warzone 2]], you can see the exact locations [https://tibia.fandom.com/wiki/Mapper?coords=129.27-124.202-11-2-1-1&mark1=129.26-124.215-11-21-1&mark2=129.35-124.172-11-21-3&mark3=129.63-124.191-11-21-3&mark4=128.251-124.226-11-21-1 here].
strategy: They are needed to break wall to enter teleport that leading to [[Gnomevil]] room. Good idea is trap them and after you clean path to walls that are needed to break, lure them.
